summary: Polish and refine the live app iteratively, improving visuals and related UX areas one-by-one.

existing_features.title: Polish the Premium experience end-to-end across Go Premium, Premium Success, Profile, and the App Drawer: improve copy/layout hierarchy, add clearer plan comparison and selection feedback, prevent accidental double-taps on Subscribe, and make Premium status + cancellation UX clearer while preserving the existing placeholder (fake) subscription behavior (no real payments).

Enhance ad-removal and premium gating polish: ensure every ad placement is consistently hidden for premium users, and make premium-only story UI states feel intentional and user-friendly (no awkward placeholders).

Polish app sharing UX for both “Share App” and “Share Story”: improve user feedback, handle cancellations/errors gracefully, and make the copy-link fallback more explicit and discoverable when system sharing is unavailable.

Polish Notifications UX and behavior: make permission state and outcomes clearer, keep the toggle state consistent with browser permission, and restyle the in-app “New story today!” simulation banner to match the app’s overall theme (avoid clashing gradients).

Apply a consistent UI polish pass across Premium, Share, and Notifications surfaces to reduce visual inconsistency: align button variants, icon sizing, card padding, separators, and microcopy tone; remove any accidental mixed styling that stands out from the rest of the app.

new_feature_requests.summary: Iteratively polish the live app one area at a time (visuals, animations, premium flow, share flow, notifications).

projectName: Iterative polish pass across Premium, Sharing, and Notifications (one-by-one)
